author: _____josh_____
content: Why not put it much further than 3 months out instead of moving it every 3 months? It's starting to look kinda stupid at this stage.

author: sky.cactus
content: Because we *should* be exercising the release process frequently.  Even if it is just a simple "push back the ice age", it still is valuable to exercise the release process.

author: sky.cactus
content: Also, we want the bomb to go off pretty close after The Merge if possible.
